Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HCT116 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was completely absent for the variant NM_007294.3:c.185delAG.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-Test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression detected in all three replicates.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression undetectable in at least two out of three replicates.

Material used.Description: DNA was extracted from peripheral blood lymphocytes.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_007294.3:c.185delAG was successfully amplified and confirmed by sequencing.

Technical replicates.Description: Each PCR reaction was run twice to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Water sample was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: None, as this was a qualitative assay.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: PCR product of expected size observed on agarose gel.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No PCR product or unexpected band pattern observed on agarose gel.
